scripts.legacy_env: ln -sfn ../ legacy/mirrorz && ln -sfn ../src/config/config.json legacy/config.json && ln -sfn ../src/i18n legacy/i18n && ln -sfn ../static/json/legacy legacy/json-legacy
scripts.debug_build: yarn dev_env && parcel build --no-optimize --no-content-hash index.html && yarn run -s gen_ver > dist/version
scripts.build: parcel build --no-source-maps index.html && yarn run -s gen_ver > dist/version
scripts.postbuild: rsync -rL --exclude=.git static robots.txt CNAME dist/ && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html
scripts.legacy_build: [ "$(yarn run --silent check_config legacy)" = "true" ] && cd legacy && node ./generator.js && cd ../ && cp -ar legacy/dist/_ dist/ || echo No legacy config
scripts.ohmymirrorz_build: [ "$(yarn run --silent check_config oh-my-mirrorz)" = "true" ] && cp scripts/oh-my-mirrorz/oh-my-mirrorz.py dist/ && yarn ohmymirrorz_date && yarn ohmymirrorz_ua_url && yarn ohmymirrorz_mirrors || echo No oh-my-mirrorz config
scripts.full_build: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn legacy_build && yarn ohmymirrorz_build
scripts.half_start: (yarn debug_build && yarn postbuild && cd dist && python3 ../scripts/gh-cors.py 1234)
scripts.full_start: (yarn debug_build && yarn legacy_env && yarn legacy_build && yarn postbuild && cd dist && python3 ../scripts/gh-cors.py 1234)
scripts.legacy_ver: [ "$(yarn run --silent check_config legacy)" = "true" ] && (cd legacy/ ; git log --oneline -1 --abbrev-commit) || true
scripts.ohmymirrorz_ver: [ "$(yarn run --silent check_config oh-my-mirrorz)" = "true" ] && (cd scripts/oh-my-mirrorz; git log --oneline -1 --abbrev-commit) || true
scripts.gen_ver: echo frontend: $(yarn run -s ver); echo config: $(yarn run -s config_ver); echo parser: $(yarn run -s parser_ver); echo i18n: $(yarn run -s i18n_ver); echo json_site: $(yarn run -s json_site_ver); echo json_legacy: $(yarn run -s json_legacy_ver); echo legacy: $(yarn run -s legacy_ver); echo ohmymirrorz: $(yarn run -s ohmymirrorz_ver)
